episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0200:
We’re about to start our treasure-hunting event!
The rules are simple!
episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0300:
All you have to do is find the treasure I hid
somewhere on or around this beach!
episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0400: The first sync pair to find the treasure wins!
episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0500:
The winning pair will also receive a VERY
generous reward from yours truly!
episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0600:
Now then, off you go! Have fun hunting for
treasure on Pasio!
episode_event_summer_2024/4001_1001_0700:
Wow! A treasure hunt? How fun! This is gonna
be great!
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0100:
All this talk about treasure, so close to the sea...
It makes me feel like a pirate!
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0200: Ooh! You look raring to go!
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0400: But I’M the one who’s gonna find that treasure!
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0600:
Hey, Lana, how are you gonna look for the
treasure?
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0700:
I figured I’d fish on the beach and search the
ocean for it with my Pokémon.
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0800: Oh, OK! Guess we’ll be working separately, then!
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_0900:
I think I’ll search along the shore with Jellicent and
Palossand.
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_1000: You and Jellicent seem to be getting along great.
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_1200:
Heh heh... Looks like I was right to entrust you
with Jellicent.
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_1300:
Why don’t we compete to see which of us can find
the treasure first?
episode_event_summer_2024/4002_1001_1400: Sure—but I won’t lose, you know!
episode_event_summer_2024/6801_1031_0100:
I wonder what sort of
adventure awaits me!
episode_event_summer_2024/6801_1001_0100:
There’s ancient treasure hidden somewhere in
the world!
episode_event_summer_2024/6801_1001_0200: Don’t you get excited just thinking about that?
episode_event_summer_2024/6801_1001_0400:
You do realize a lot of ancient treasures are
possessed by ghost Pokémon, don’t you?
episode_event_summer_2024/6801_1001_0500:
Oh. Well, if I ever DO find any ancient treasure,
Acerola, I think I’ll give it to you...
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0200:
I’m sure it’s something incredible if Lear
prepared it...
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0300:
I’m curious about that “generous reward” he’s
promised the winners, too!
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0400:
At any rate, I’ve got to find the treasure before
anyone else does!
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0500: Oh! I didn’t know there was a cave over there!
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0600:
It looks awfully suspicious... My treasure sense is
tingling!
episode_event_summer_2024/4003_1001_0700:
I need to search that cave before any other
Trainers find it!
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_0200:
It’s darker than I expected... I’m not going to run
into any ghosts in here, am I?
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_0300:
Oof... Just thinking about ghosts is freaking
me out...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_0500: What was that noise? Is someone there?
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_0700: Don’t tell me it’s a gh—
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1100: Oh, it’s just you, Acerola. Phew! You scared me...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1300:
I saw you go into this cave, Gardenia, so I
followed you out of curiosity...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1400:
I don’t suppose you found the treasure already,
did you?
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1500:
No, not yet. But I still haven’t checked out the
deeper parts of the cave yet.
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1600: I kept hearing this creepy sound...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1700: That one! Did you hear it?!
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1800: I thought it might be a ghost...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_1900:
You mean a ghost Pokémon? Then let’s go check
it out!
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_2000:
Knowing Lear, he might have gotten a Pokémon to
guard the treasure.
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_2400:
As a Gym Leader, I couldn’t possibly let you put
yourself in danger...
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_2500:
I’ve got Jellicent with me, and Palossand is inside
her Poké Ball, so I’ll be OK!
episode_event_summer_2024/4004_1001_2600:
If you don’t want to go any further, I can go
on ahead!
episode_event_summer_2024/4005_1001_0200: W-Wait, Acerola... You walk too fast!
episode_event_summer_2024/4005_1001_0400: Are you sure you’re not scared of ghosts?
episode_event_summer_2024/4005_1001_0500: O-Of course! I’m not the least bit scared!
episode_event_summer_2024/4005_1001_0700: Sure I’m sure! Just watch me!
episode_event_summer_2024/4005_1001_1000: It’s OK! I won’t tell anyone!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0100: Well, here we are—the depths of the cave...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0300: Wait a minute... Who’s that Pokémon?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0500: So that’s what was making those noises!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0600:
You mean those were just Pokémon cries all
along? Thank goodness...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0700: I thought for sure it was a ghost...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_0800: Huh? But Dhelmise IS a ghost Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1100:
I’m not sure why, but unlike other ghost Pokémon,
it’s not that scary to me...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1200:
That must be because Dhelmise is ALSO a
Grass-type Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1300:
Oh, I see! If it’s a Grass-type Pokémon, then
even I...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1500:
Well, now we know what was making that noise,
but I don’t see any treasure here. Do you?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1600: No. So, what’s Dhelmise doing here?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1700:
I don’t see a Trainer anywhere, and it doesn’t
seem like Lear put it here to guard the treasure...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1800:
Hmm... Maybe it’s a wild Pokémon that got lost
and somehow ended up on Pasio.
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_1900:
I know, Gardenia! Why don’t you become a sync
pair with Dhelmise?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2100:
It’s not a bad idea to have some Ghost-type
Pokémon on your team!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2200:
Me with a ghost Pokémon... Could I really become
a sync pair with Dhelmise?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2600: I think I might have hurt Dhelmise’s feelings...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2700: You didn’t want Dhelmise as your partner?
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2800:
That’s not it—I want to get to know Dhelmise
better.
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_2900: It’s just...I really do have hang-ups about ghosts...
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_3000:
...You know what? I want to find Dhelmise again
so I can set things straight!
episode_event_summer_2024/4006_1001_3100: Yeah, let’s go find it and apologize!
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0100: Jellicent led us out of the cave...
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0200:
But all I see out here are sync pairs caught up in
the treasure hunt!
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0400: Oh, of course! It must be in the sea!
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0500:
How do you think we could get Dhelmise to come
out?
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0800:
I mean, I understand the logic...but where are we
going to get a fishing rod?
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_0900:
Let’s see... She should be fishing around here
somewhere...
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1100: Oh my. What’s going on here?
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1200: Listen, Lana! We’ve got a favor to ask...
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1300: Ah, so that’s what you’re after.
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1400:
In that case, please, go right ahead and use my
fishing rod.
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1500:
Are you sure, Lana? Weren’t you using your fishing
rod to look for the treasure?
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1600:
Oh, I’ve got plenty of fishing rods—all handmade
Lana originals!
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1700:
I always carry a few around to share with anyone
who’s interested in fishing.
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_1800:
I hope you land a big catch and reel in
that Dhelmise!
episode_event_summer_2024/4007_1001_2000: Just watch—I’ll fish up Dhelmise for sure!
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0200: Hey, Lana, is it hard to fish up a Dhelmise?
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0300: I certainly wouldn’t expect it to be easy.
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0400:
But in this case, you know where Dhelmise is,
right?
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0600: Then I don’t think it should take too long.
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0700: I...I think something’s tugging the line!
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_0800: You’ve got it! Now pull with all your strength!
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_1000: ...No good! I can’t pull it any closer!
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_1500: No use. I don’t think we’re making any headway...
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_1600: I didn’t realize Dhelmise was so heavy...
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_1700: Then let’s get more people to help us!
episode_event_summer_2024/4008_1001_1800: Hold on, Gardenia! We’re going to get help!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0100:
Sorry to keep you waiting, Gardenia! We brought
some people we found nearby!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0200:
Sounds like you’re up to something pretty
interesting!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0300: Let me lend you a hand!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0500:
My brother and I are perfectly in sync, so I think
we could be of assistance!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0600:
I may not be much help, but I’ll do whatever
I can!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_0700:
Thank you, everyone! With all of us working
together, we’ll definitely be able to do this!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1101_1300: But the line refused to budge...
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_1400: No way... Even THAT wasn’t enough?
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_1500:
Looks like we need to find some stronger
Trainers...
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_1700:
And I brought help—including a strapping young
swimmer!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_1800:
I hear you could use some help from me and my
massive pecs!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_1900:
And I’ve come to lend you the strength I’ve honed
through pro wrestling!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_2000:
You’re trying to fish up Dhelmise, yeah? Then
we’re the right ones for the job!
episode_event_summer_2024/4009_1001_2200: This time, I think we can really do this!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_0700:
...We’re doing it! We’re pulling up Dhelmise, little
by little!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_0800:
Come on, everyone... We’re almost there! Hang in
there just a little longer!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_1600: Umm... I want to apologize about before!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_1700:
It’s not that I don’t like you! I was just a little
startled...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_1900:
Looks like Dhelmise wants to be friends with you
too, Gardenia!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2100:
I think Dhelmise was lonely because it didn’t have
any friends.
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2200:
But it was too scared to make the first move on
its own, so it waited for someone to find it.
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2300: I see... So you get scared just like me, huh?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2500:
If you like, would you become a sync pair
with me?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2600: I’m still a little scared of ghost Pokémon...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2700:
But I’ve got a feeling that you and I can
get along!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_2800:
Thank you! Great to make your acquaintance,
Dhelmise!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3000: I see you’ve found the treasure! Well done!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3200:
This sparkling golden statue is the very treasure
I hid!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3300:
Oh, right... We fished that up along with Dhelmise,
didn’t we?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3400: Yeah. Seems like it got tangled up with Dhelmise.
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3500:
I’ve been observing your activities this entire
time!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3600:
And I have decided—the winners of this treasure
hunt are Gardenia and Acerola!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3700: I take it there are no objections?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_3900:
We were only able to fish up that treasure in the
first place thanks to everyone’s help...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4000: But you two were the first to find it.
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4200:
More importantly, though—what about that
“generous reward,” Lear?!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4300:
Heh heh... You’ve been curious about that, have
you?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4400: The prize for this event is...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4700:
Can you even THINK of a more prestigious prize
than a statue of me, the owner of Pasio?!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_4800:
I feel like something similar to this has happened
before...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_5000:
I was right! There are rare stones being used as
embellishments here!
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_5100:
Hey, what do you say we give this statue to
Steven?
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_5200:
I don’t think the two of us would get much use out
of it anyway...
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_5400: Steven, you can have that statue if you like.
episode_event_summer_2024/4010_1001_5700: we already found an even more precious treasure!
